section.title: Uploading the Appliance with the Image Uploader
section.para: The following procedure uploads the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance using the Image Uploader tool.

procedure.title: To Upload the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance

step.para: Change to the directory containing the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance.
Substitute the newimagename with your chosen name for the image.
Substitute the myexportdomain with your chosen Export storage domain.
Enter the password of the default administrative user for your Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager when prompted.
step.screen: Please provide the REST API password for the admin@internal oVirt Engine user (CTRL+D to abort): **********

important.para: Ensure your Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager has administrator access to the chosen Export storage domain.

section.para: It takes approximately 90 minutes to upload the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance file to the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager.
